title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Finance) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department finance) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Stephen Foley, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
Jennifer Carroll MacNeill, Minister of State at the Department of Finance, with 
effect from 13 March 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 July, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [399] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN,

D08 XAO6

r-phost: publications@opw.ie
